inspireKeywords.title: INSPIRE Data Themes

value.name: Area management/restriction/regulation zones and reporting units
value.code: Area management/restriction/regulation zones and reporting units

inspireKeywords.value: Area management/restriction/regulation zones and reporting units

serviceSpecifications.title: European Commission Regulations

value.name: COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1205/2008 of 3 December 2008 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards metadata
Corrigendum to INSPIRE Metadata Regulation published in the Official Journal of the European Union, L 328, page 83

Commission Regulation (EU) No 1089/2010 of 23 November 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards interoperability of spatial data sets and services
COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 1088/2010 of 23 November 2010 amending Regulation (EC) No 976/2009 as regards download services and transformation services
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 976/2009 of 19 October 2009 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards the Network Services

COMMISSION REGULATION (EU) No 268/2010 of 29 March 2010 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards the access to spatial data sets and services of the Member States by Community institutions and bodies under harmonised conditions

serviceSpecifications.value: Access to spatial data sets and services

value.name: Commission Decision of 5 June 2009 implementing Directive 2007/2/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council as regards monitoring and reporting (notified under document number C(2009) 4199) (2009/442/EC)
DIRECTIVE 2007/2/EC OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL of 14 March 2007 establishing an Infrastructure for Spatial Information in the European Community (INSPIRE)
humanCatalogueViewer
value.qtip: Client service that allows a user to interact with a catalogue to locate, browse, and manage metadata about geographic data or geographic services.

value.name: humanGeographicViewer
value.qtip: Client service that allows a user to view one or more feature collections or coverages.

value.name: humanGeographicSpreadsheetViewer
value.qtip: Client service that allows a user to interact with multiple data objects and to request calculations similar to an arithmetic spreadsheet but extended to geographic data.

value.name: humanServiceEditor
value.qtip: Client service that allows a user to control geographic processing services.

value.name: humanChainDefinitionEditor
value.qtip: Provides user interaction with a chain definition service.

value.name: humanWorkflowEnactmentManager
value.qtip: Provides user interaction with a workflow enactment service.

value.name: humanGeographicFeatureEditor
value.qtip: Geographic viewer that allows a user to interact with feature data.

value.name: humanGeographicSymbolEditor
value.qtip: Client service that allows a human to select and manage symbol libraries.

value.name: humanFeatureGeneralizationEditor
value.qtip: Client service that allows a user to modify the cartographic characteristics of a feature or feature collection by simplifying its visualisation, while maintaining its salient elements – the spatial equivalent of simplification.

value.name: humanGeographicDataStructureViewer
value.qtip: Client service that allows a user to access part of data set to see its internal structure.

value.name: infoFeatureAccessService
value.qtip: Service that provides a client access to and management of a feature store.

value.name: infoMapAccessService
value.qtip: Service that provides a client access to a geographic graphics, i.e. pictures of geographic data.

value.name: infoCoverageAccessService
value.qtip: Service that provides a client access to and management of a coverage store.

value.name: infoSensorDescriptionService
value.qtip: Service that provides the description of a coverage sensor, including sensor location and orientation, as well as the sensor’s geometric, dynamic, and radiometric characteristics for geo-processing purposes.

value.name: infoProductAccessService
value.qtip: Service that provides access to and management of a geographic product store.

value.name: infoFeatureTypeService
value.qtip: Service that provides a client to access to and management of a store of feature type definitions.

value.name: infoCatalogueService
value.qtip: Service that provides discovery and management services on a store of metadata about instances.

value.name: infoRegistryService
value.qtip: Service that provides access to store of metadata about types.

value.name: infoGazetteerService
value.qtip: Service that provides access to a directory of instances of a class or classes of real-world phenomena containing some information regarding position.

value.name: inforOrderHandlingService
value.qtip: Service that provides a client with the ability to order products from a provider.

value.name: infoStandingOrderService
value.qtip: Order handling service that allows a user to request that a product over a geographic area be disseminated when it becomes available.

value.name: taskChainDefinitionService
value.qtip: Service to define a chain and to enable it to be executed by the workflow enactment service.

value.name: taskWorkflowEnactmentService
value.qtip: The workflow enactment service interprets a chain and controls the instantiation of services and sequencing of activities.

value.name: taskSubscriptionService
value.qtip: Service to allow clients to register for notification about events.

value.name: spatialCoordinateConversionService
value.qtip: Service to change coordinates from one coordinate system to another coordinate system that is related to the same datum.

value.name: spatialCoordinatetransformationService
value.qtip: Service to change coordinates from a coordinate reference system based on one datum to a coordinate reference system based on a second datum.

value.name: spatialCoverageVectorConversionService
value.qtip: Service to change the spatial representation from a coverage schema to a vector schema, or vice versa.

value.name: spatialImageConversionService
value.qtip: A coordinate transformation or coordinate conversion service to change the coordinate reference system for an image.

value.name: spatialRectificationService
value.qtip: Service for transforming an image into a perpendicular parallel projection and therefore a constant scale.

value.name: spatialOrthorectificationService
value.qtip: A rectification service that removes image tilt and displacement due to terrain elevation.

value.name: spatialSensorGeometryModelAdjustmentService
value.qtip: Service that adjusts sensor geometry models to improve the match of the image with other images and/or known ground positions.

value.name: spatialGeometryModelConversionService
value.qtip: Service that converts sensor geometry models into a different but equivalent sensor geometry model.

value.name: spatialSubsettingService
value.qtip: Service that extracts data from an input in a continuous spatial region either by geographic location or by grid coordinates.

value.name: spatialSamplingService
value.qtip: Service that extracts data from an input using a consistent sampling scheme either by geographic location or by grid coordinates.

value.name: spatialTilingChangeService
value.qtip: Service that changes the tiling of geographic data.

value.name: spatialDimensionMeasurementService
value.qtip: Service to compute dimensions of objects visible in an image or other geodata.

value.name: spatialFeatureManipulationService
value.qtip: Register one feature to another, an image, or another data set or coordinate set; correcting for relative translation shifts, rotational differences, scale differences, and perspective differences. Verify that all features in the Feature Collection are topologically consistent according to the topology rules of the Feature Collection, and identifies and/or corrects any inconsistencies that are discovered.

value.name: spatialFeatureMatchingService
value.qtip: Service that determines which features and portions of features represent the same real world entity from multiple data sources, e.g., edge matching and limited conflation.

value.name: spatialFeatureGeneralizationService
value.qtip: Service that reduces spatial variation in a feature collection to increase the effectiveness of communication by counteracting the undesirable effects of data reduction.

value.name: spatialRouteDeterminationService
value.qtip: Service to determine the optimal path between two specified points based on the input parameters and properties contained in the Feature Collection.

value.name: spatialPositioningService
value.qtip: Service provided by a position-providing device to use, obtain and unambiguously interpret position information, and determines whether the results meet the requirements of the use.

value.name: spatialProximityAnalysisService
value.qtip: Given a position or geographic feature, finds all objects with a given set of attributes that are located within a user-specified distance of the position or feature.

value.name: thematicGeoparameterService
value.qtip: Service to derive application-oriented quantitative results that are not available from the raw data itself.

value.name: thematicClassificationService
value.qtip: Service to classify regions of geographic data based on thematic attributes.

value.name: thematicFeatureGeneralizationService
value.qtip: Service that generalises feature types in a feature collection to increase the effectiveness of communication by counteracting the undesirable effects of data reduction.

value.name: thematicSubsettingService
value.qtip: Service that extracts data from an input based on parameter values.

value.name: thematicSpatialCountingService
value.qtip: Service that counts geographic features.

value.name: thematicChangeDetectionService
value.qtip: Service to find differences between two data sets that represent the same geographical area at different times.

value.name: thematicGeographicInformationExtractionService
value.qtip: Services supporting the extraction of feature and terrain information from remotely sensed and scanned images.

value.name: thematicImageProcessingService
value.qtip: Service to change the values of thematic attributes of an image using a mathematical function.

value.name: thematicReducedResolutionGenerationService
value.qtip: Service that reduces the resolution of an image.

value.name: thematicImageManipulationService
value.qtip: Services for manipulating data values in images: changing colour and contrast values, applying various filters, manipulating image resolution, noise removal, ‘striping’, systematic-radiometric corrections, atmospheric attenuation, changes in scene illumination, etc.

value.name: thematicUnderstandingService
value.qtip: Services that provide automated image change detection, registered image differencing, significance-ofdifference analysis and display, and area-based and model-based differencing.

value.name: thematicImageSynthesisService
value.qtip: Services for creating or transforming images using computer-based spatial models, perspective transformations, and manipulations of image characteristics to improve visibility, sharpen resolution, and/or reduce the effects of cloud cover or haze.

value.name: thematicMultiBandImageManipulation
value.qtip: Services that modify an image using the multiple bands of the image.

value.name: thematicObjectDetectionService
value.qtip: Service to detect real-world objects in an image.

value.name: thematicGeoparsingService
value.qtip: Service to scan text documents for location-based references, such as a place names, addresses, postal codes, etc., in preparation for passage to a geocoding service.

value.name: thematicGeocodingService
value.qtip: Service to augment location-based text references with geographic coordinates (or some other spatial reference).

value.name: temporalReferenceSystemTransformationService
value.qtip: Service to change the values of temporal instances from one temporal reference system to another temporal reference system.

value.name: temporalSubsettingService
value.qtip: Service that extracts data from an input in a continuous interval based on temporal position values.

value.name: temporalSamplingService
value.qtip: Služba, která vybírá data ze vstupu s použitím bezesporného vzorkovacího schématu založeného na hodnotách časových poloh.

value.name: temporalProximityAnalysisService
value.qtip: Given a temporal interval or event, find all objects with a given set of attributes that are located within a userspecified interval from the interval or event.

value.name: metadataStatisticalCalculationService
value.qtip: Service to calculate the statistics of a data set.

value.name: metadataGeographicAnnotationService
value.qtip: Services to add ancillary information to an image or a feature in a feature collection.

value.name: comEncodingService
value.qtip: Service that provides implementation of an encoding rule and provides an interface to encoding and decoding functionality.

value.name: comTransferService
value.qtip: Service that provides implementation of one or more transfer protocols, which allows data transfer between distributed information systems over offline or online communication media.

value.name: comGeographicCompressionService
value.qtip: Service that converts spatial portions of a feature collection to and from compressed form.

value.name: comGeographicFormatConversionService
value.qtip: Service that converts from one geographic data format to another.

value.name: comMessagingService
value.qtip: Service that allows multiple users to simultaneously view, comment about, and request edits of feature collections.

value.name: comRemoteFileAndExecutableManagement
value.qtip: Service that provides access to secondary storage of geographic features as if it were local to the client.
